title: Cannot select multiple connections, inheritance is not useful in current implementation.
author: leosenko
body_snippet:
Selection of multiple connections is not possible. Managing the connections one by one is extremely time consuming.
Inheritance is not very usable if it is a posteriori and if it cannot be set for multiple connections at once (again not possible to select multiple connections) and without the ability to change values of multiple inheritance values.

## Expected Behavior
If I want to change icon or any property for multiple connections I would expect selecting multiple connections and setting...

comments.snippet:
Hi,

I'm using the last nightly build, and the MULTIPLE SELECTION is available. However, it's useless. For exemple, when I select more than one connection, then I can't delete them with the < DEL > key. I hope you will fix this in the future.

Thank you for continuing the development of this useful tool!
Regards.
